title: Some new results for the GHWS model
abstract:
Here we outline some new results for the GHWS model which points to a
discretization of parameter space into well differentiated collective dynamic
states. We argue this can lead to basic processes in parameter space, starting
with minimum modelling ingredients: a complex network with a disorder parameter
and an excitable dynamics (cellular automata) on it.
subjects: Condensed Matter/Disordered Systems and Neural Networks
